'Tis The Season 2oz Body Butter

Regular price $13.99
/

Dirty Bees Body Butter is handmade of Cocoa Butter, Shea Butter, Red Raspberry Seed Oil and Coconut Oil. Our All-Natural Body Butter is formulated to give you the perfect amount of moisturizer that your skin so desperately needs without leaving you feeling oily or greasy.

  • Cocoa Butter: It is an antioxidant powerhouse that reduces stretch marks and scars and used as a rich moisturizer, that helps heal sensitive skin.
  • Shea Butter: Using shea butter on your body, especially your face, can condition, tone, and soothe your skin.
  • Red Raspberry Seed Oil: As a great source of antioxidants and vitamins A and E, red raspberry seed oil can slow the aging process, stimulate collagen production, and help your skin appear more youthful and vibrant.
  • Coconut Oil: provides deep moisture without making your skin oily.

Tis' The Season is a Unisex scent and works great for all skin types.

Key Information about our Body Butters:

  • Travel Friendly
  • 100% Vegan
  • Animal Cruelty-Free
  • Reusable Container
  • Mother Nature Approved
  • Gluten Free

Ingredients: Water, Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceteareth 20, Flax Seed Oil, Hemp Seed Oil, Fragrance, Sodium Carbomer, Red Raspberry Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol
